note.p: Education: Cheltenham College; Royal Military College, Sandhurst; Royal Military Academy, Woolwich

Career: Joined the Army, in the Royal Engineers (1857); explored Palestine and conducted excavations in Jeruslalem (1867-1870); served in the South African wars (1877-1879 and 1899-1900); Colonel (1882); Chief Commissioner, Metropolitan Police (1886-1888); Major General (1893); General (1904)
